item.description:
Snow tubing at Bretton Woods!

"Fly down our sculpted tubing run for a thrill ride perfect for the whole family. With packed powder made for speed you'll want to attack the hills again and again. Laugh it up as you spin, glide and slide down our fun runs. Go solo down the run or grab someone else for a tandem ride where you'll pick up even more speed. And the best part is - you don't need any experience, special skills or lessons. Just rent one of our tubes and let the fun begin."

Cost: $5 per tube, per hour. Note there is not a lift take takes you and your tube up. It's good old fashioned walk up then sled down.

http://brettonwoods.com/winter_sports/more_winter_fun/tubing
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the Bretton Woods Nordic Center - Right inside the door. Their number is 603-278-8989
item.name: Snow Tubing
